name: Flat Arc Reddit
description:
An Arc (GTK Theme) Inspired theme for reddit.
Flat/Minimal style with white/grey elements, Buttons,
and attempts to reduce clutter
additional_info:
Please disable subreddit-specific styles.
This theme hides the sidebar: To show, hover your cursor on the right of the screen.

Version 1.3.1 Notes:
    NSFW/Spoiler Stamps stopped having blue highlight when clicked
    Font sizes of buttons and subreddit tabs set to 10
    Most hyperlinks added underline/changed colours
    Blue "Infobar" on the top of locked posts aswell
    Partly refactored comments
